title: Amy Is Getting A Hang On Motherhood And Crying Less + Eddie Was Parent Shamed At The Grocery Store
itunes:title: Amy Is Getting A Hang On Motherhood And Crying Less + Eddie Was Parent Shamed At The Grocery Store
description:
Amy gives an update on motherhood, and how she's noticed she's crying less. Eddie gets called out by someone about his parenting skills while grocery shopping with his sons. Also, Bobby debates who the worst driver on the show is.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
